Title: Relates to employer contributions to the unemployment insurance fund and the unemployment insurance maximum benefit rate
Summary: Specifies contribution rates for employers to the unemployment insurance fund in the 2022 and 2023 fiscal years, regardless of what the current actual size of the fund index is; sets the unemployment insurance maximum benefit rate.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to employer contributions to the unemployment insurance fund and the unemployment insurance maximum benefit rate
